search_swsh_2021/6601_1201_0200_10:
I’m a bit lost again, to tell you the truth. Could you
point me to the Pokémon Center?
search_swsh_2021/6601_1201_0500_10: All right! This looks like a great shortcut!
search_swsh_2021/6602_1201_0100_10:
Now I’ve gone and got separated from
my Charizard...
search_swsh_2021/6602_1201_0200_10:
Would you help me find him, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? That’d be a big help!
search_swsh_2021/6603_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Marnie heard
rumors of Team Break causing trouble, and they
ran to put a stop to it!
search_swsh_2021/6603_1201_0200_10:
C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We’re gonna
take care of these—
search_swsh_2021/6603_1201_0400_10: We’re gonna protect the peace on Pasio!
search_swsh_2021/6603_1201_0500_10:
Wow, how brave! Let’s leave the battling to
them. We can always jump in if things start
lookin’ dangerous.
search_swsh_2021/6603_1201_0600_10:
That frees us up to support them with some
cheering! Let’s make some noise!
